about_the_game:
Background is the backdrop to your story, it defines the overall impression of your mood and vibe, sets the scene for your story to unfold, and you want to make sure it looks right and translates your true intention. With some help from Studio Tokiwa's professional artists you can give your game the backdrop it deserves!

TOKIWA GRAPHICS presents 4 packs of battle Back-Grounds with different themes. This pack contains Woods and Riverside BG with 4-6 variations each, total of 10 beautiful images ready to be used for your RPG Maker project!

These graphics are for RPG Maker use only!

Features:

* "Woods" themed battle BackGround (6 variations; day, day in shade, sunset, sunset in shade, night, rain)
* "Riverside" themed battle BackGround (4 variations; day, sunset, night, rain)
* Total of 10 BG images for your RPG Maker projects!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker only
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - TOKIWA GRAPHICS Battle BG No.2 Woods/Riverside" and "RPG Maker MV - TOKIWA GRAPHICS Battle BG No.2 Woods/Riverside" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

Background is the backdrop to your story, it defines the overall impression of your mood and vibe, sets the scene for your story to unfold, and you want to make sure it looks right and translates your true intention. With some help from Studio Tokiwa's professional artists you can give your game the backdrop it deserves! TOKIWA GRAPHICS presents 4 packs of battle Back-Grounds with different themes.
